intro: Gymnotheca chinensis, commonly known as the Chinese gymnotheca, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Malvaceae and is characterized by its hairy stems and lobed leaves. The plant produces small, yellowish flowers that are clustered in racemes. Gymnotheca chinensis is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and mountainous regions. Its botanical features make it an interesting subject for both horticultural and ecological studies.
